attributes.additional_details: I feel that it’s cruel and a disgusting how you let people suffer in the uk and Europe with no quality of life
attributes.background: Bring out Euthanasia’s in to uk to stop not just the people fighting the diseases and illnesses but the families too with the heartbreak of Parkinson’s Alzheimer’s,huntinsons dementia

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/642264
